* \[[`54d5898c7b`](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/commit/54d5898c7b)] - **(SEMVER-PATCH)** \[DI] Support non-normalized source path names in source maps (Thomas Watson) [#5821](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-js/pull/5821)
